macro_lAjG5VXM.name: human_readable_number
macro_lAjG5VXM.definition:
CASE
  WHEN {{number}} < 1000
    THEN CAST({{number}} AS string)
  WHEN {{number}} < 1000000
    THEN concat(CAST({{number}}/1000 AS string), 'K')
  ELSE concat(CAST({{number}}/1000000 AS string), 'M')
END
macro_lAjG5VXM.description: this macro a number into human approximate readable number ex. 14,001 -> 14K, 1,034,430 -> 1M and so on

propertiesFile.name: macros
propertiesFile.content:
---
version: 2
macros:
- name: "human_readable_number"
  description: "this macro a number into human approximate readable number ex. 14,001\
    \ -> 14K, 1,034,430 -> 1M and so on"
  arguments:
  - name: "number"
    type: "unknown"
  macroType: "expression"

macros.name: human_readable_number
